data.persona: I was born the runt of my litter. I learned to fit and grow strong. Then one day a bite willed me with uncontrollable rage.
data.description:
You are in the Dunes.
A massive hilly landscape that is nothing but sand and a few rocks.  As you walk this area, you can find some human and animal remains along with broken down wood wagons.
The fairy is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the fairy to give me some nectar
data.mid_motivation: I want to get out of the dunes and return to my pack
data.long_motivation: I want to hunt down and get revenge on whatever bit me that made me rabid
